DESCRIPTION: This card does *not* #ysatisfy any conditions in the #yForeplay Sequence. (It won’t reduce their counters by being played, though its effects might still reduce them.)
Forcibly satisfies all #yLonging and #yDesire effects in the #yForeplay Sequence.
Cards in the Foreplay Sequence appear at the top of the screen. It's a new card zone where cards activate effects once their conditions are met.
When played, adds a card representing the Pregnancy to the #yForeplay Sequence. Reduces damage equal to its counter.
When played, sent to the #yForeplay Sequence. NL Once its condition is #ysatisfied, reduce its counter. NL When the counter reaches zero, it #ytriggers the listed effect and returns to the draw pile.
When played, sent to the #yForeplay Sequence. NL When its condition is #ysatisfied, reduce its counter and #ytrigger the listed effect. NL Once the counter hits zero, return it to the draw pile.

When played, sent to the #yForeplay Sequence. NL Once its condition is #ysatisfied, reduce its counter. NL When the counter hits zero, return to the draw pile. NL If it leaves the #yForeplay Sequence with counters remaining, #ytrigger the listed effect.
Discard this card directly from the #yForeplay Sequence.
If in the #yForeplay Sequence: at the end of the turn, discard this card directly from the #yForeplay Sequence.
Discard this card directly from the #yForeplay Sequence.
At the end of the turn, #yRelease this card — discard it directly from the #yForeplay Sequence.
If the #yPregnancy State is broken by attack damage, trigger the #yMiscarry effect.
If the #yPregnancy State is removed by non-attack damage, trigger the #yNatural Birth effect.
